member.name: DXGI_SAMPLE_DESC
member.summary: Describes multi-sampling parameters for a resource.

member.name: DXGI_SAMPLE_DESC.Count
member.summary: The number of multisamples per pixel.

summary.para: The image quality level. The higher the quality, the lower the performance. The valid range is between zero and one less than the level returned by for Direct3D 10 or for Direct3D 11.
For Direct3D 10.1 and Direct3D 11, you can use two special quality level values. For more information about these quality level values, see Remarks.
